name: Dont Fear the Sheep Remix
description:
THE LAST DREAMS OF A DEVOTED FARMER

Story

You are an old farmer with a recurrent dream that lasts 10 nights. 

Jump across the clouds to exit the dream, pick all your sheep and avoid been attacked by the nightmare.

Gameplay

An arcade memory-like game. You need to make your way through the clouds to pick your sheep, but sometimes those clouds are not real and you will fall and get back to your initial position. Once you have them all the door will shine and you can escape through it.

Keep in mind that the dream lasts for a few seconds and you might have to run away from the nightmare. Reapers are chasing you through the clouds. The dream restarts if a Reaper touch you.

Controls

Gamepad and Keyboad Supported

  • Move: WASD / Arrows / DPAD / Left Stick
  • Jump: SPACEBAR / Face Buttons (A,B,X,Y, Triangle, Square, X, O)

Core loop

  1. Dream Starts (Timer Starts).
  2. Pick the sheep.
  3. Avoid the Reapers.
  4. Reach the door (ALL sheep collected).
  5. Next dream starts.
